GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.89
GSD.description:
mac80211: fix locking in ieee80211_start_ap error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.89 by commit ac61b9c6c0549aaeb98194cf429d93c41bfe5f79, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 295b02c4be74bebf988593b8322369513fcecf68. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mac80211: fix locking in ieee80211_start_ap error path
